about.description: A passionate tech explorer specializing in Full Stack Development, Artificial Intelligence, and Data Science. Currently diving deep into AI Agents and Blockchain technology.

leadIn.label: WHAT I DO
leadIn.thesis: I build AI systems and the infrastructure that makes them reliable at scale.
leadIn.scope: Focusing on predictive models, LLM powered applications, and RAG pipelines designed for production environments and measurable performance.
leadIn.integration: Beyond models, I architect full-stack solutions: secure backends, modern interfaces, and scalable pipelines.

coreEngineering.label: Core Engineering
coreEngineering.title:
Proven stack.
Measurable results.
coreEngineering.p1: I develop applied AI systems using TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, and LangChain, structuring workflows and exposing models as services through Flask and FastAPI.
coreEngineering.p2: Integrated into full-stack apps with Next.js, Express.js, and Spring Boot, backed by PostgreSQL and Prisma ORM.
coreEngineering.p3: All projects use disciplined version control, Docker containerization, and are built for stable production deployment.

experiencesList.desc: Technical evaluation and quality assurance of ML project submissions. Validating logical correctness, efficiency, and enforcing industry best practices for learners.
Translating complex requirements into SRS documentation and designing system architectures using UML diagrams. Collaborative engineering focused on robust software design.
Developing AI-driven research products and designing learning materials for Deep Learning and Computer Vision. Contributing to collaborative research initiatives in intelligent systems.
Built Transformer-based attack detection models for cybersecurity applications. Managed large-scale datasets through the full ML pipeline â€” from preprocessing to hyperparameter optimization.
End-to-end development of intelligent models using state-of-the-art Deep Learning architectures. Implemented ML algorithms for real-world AIoT applications including human pose estimation systems.

projectsList.title: Creative Portfolio Website
projectsList.desc: Modern, animated portfolio with 3D elements, physics-simulated interactions, and shader-based warp effects. Engineered for high performance and immersive user experience.

projectsList.title: SNBTIn - Platform Persiapan SNBT 2025
projectsList.desc: Leading EdTech platform in Indonesia for exam preparation. Featuring a comprehensive learning ecosystem with interactive videos, practice questions, and real-time analytics.

projectsList.title: TerraFlow Platform
projectsList.desc: Enterprise IoT solution for precision agriculture. ESP32 sensor nodes communicate directly with Firebase via a Go (Gin) backend, with a Next.js dashboard for real-time monitoring and actuator control.

projectsList.title: DocsInsight Engine
projectsList.desc: Private RAG platform for intelligent document analysis. Powered by local LLMs through Ollama, with LangChain orchestration and ChromaDB vector search â€” fully self-hosted for data privacy.

projectsList.title: POLABDC Dental Management
projectsList.desc: AI-powered dental clinic SaaS with disease prediction, real-time queue management, and a Monorepo architecture connecting Next.js, Express.js, and a Python AI microservice.

hero.title: LET'S TALK
hero.subtitle: Have an idea? Let's build something extraordinary together.

faqData.q: What is your main area of expertise?
faqData.a: As an Information Technology student at Telkom University and a Research Assistant at the Cyber Physical System Laboratory, I specialize in the intersection of Artificial Intelligence (Computer Vision & Deep Learning), Full-stack Development (Next.js & Node.js), and emerging Blockchain/Web3 technologies.

faqData.q: Are you available for research or freelance collaborations?
faqData.a: Absolutely. I am currently active in AI research at the CPS Lab and HUMIC Research Center, but I'm always open to innovative freelance projects, internships, or technical collaborations that bridge innovation with strategic execution.

faqData.q: What is your typical tech stack for production?
faqData.a: For AI projects, I primarily use Python with TensorFlow, PyTorch, and YOLO. For web applications, my go-to is the T3-style stack: Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, often integrated with AI Agents or Smart Contracts where appropriate.

faqData.q: Do you have experience with enterprise or lab projects?
faqData.a: Yes, I've served as a System Analyst and AI Developer in various research-driven environments. I've architected everything from AIoT platforms and attack detection systems to student practicum modules for global audiences.

faqData.q: How can we start a partnership or project?
faqData.a: The most efficient way is to use the contact form above or reach out directly via email at azril4974@gmail.com. I'm usually able to respond within 24 hours to discuss how my technical skill set can add value to your initiatives.
